\u20B9 1500 \u20B9 2000 Know More Please enter correct details for successful DTH Recharge otherwise your recharge will fail. What\'s my Customer ID (DTH number)? To know your customer ID, please press the MENU button on your remote and select My Account . Alternatively, SMS BAL to 54325 from Registered Mobile Number (RMN) or place a missed call on 81300-81300 from your RMN. What\'s my Viewing Card (VC) Number? To know your Viewing Card Number, go to the help menu on your TV and select My Account. What\'s my Subscriber ID? To know your Subscriber ID, press the HOME button on your remote. Alternatively, give a missed call on 080-61-9999-11 from your Registered Mobile Number. What\'s my Subscriber ID? To know your Subscriber ID, press the green color button on your D2H remote. Alternatively, SMS \'ID\' from your registered mobile number to 566777 or call 97818-97818 (Toll-Free).
